service.name: Register for ABN
service.description: This service enable businesses businesses to register for taxation purposes by applying for an Australian Business Number (ABN).

Dimension.name: Australian Business Register - Registrations
Dimension.desc: This service enable businesses to register for Australian Business Number (ABN).

Dimension.name: Registration Services
Dimension.desc: The Registration cluster encompasses all services for the community to register themselves for their tax and super obligations and to maintain these registrations accurately as their situation changes. These services enable businesses to register for taxation purposes, and to maintain their registration - this includes their Australian Business Number (ABN) and other roles that relate to specific taxation obligations (e.g. GST, PAYGW, etc.). The community is expected to proactively register themselves accurately. Accurate registration allows for accurate level of compliance.
